sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills
  // Fix for centering pills with text-center class in parent element.
  display: inline-block

  > li
    & > a
      color: $gray-light

      &:hover
        background-color: transparent

        color: $text-color

    // Active state
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-color

        background-color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills--large
  > li > a
    font-family: $headings-font-family

    font-size: $font-size-h2


.nav-pills--arrows
  &:after
    border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light

    width: 100%

  > li
    margin-bottom: -1px

    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        +arrow($gray-light, white, "bottom", "in", 10px, 25px)
        background: transparent

        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg
sections.renderMarkup:
• Home

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs
  border: none

  margin: -8px 0 0

  overflow: hidden

  text-transform: uppercase

  font-weight: $headings-font-weight

  // z-index configuration for .listing--tabs-spacer class of included view.
  position: relative

  z-index: 1

  &:after
    content: ''

    width: 100%

    display: block

    border-bottom: 1px $gray-light solid

    position: absolute

    bottom: 0


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs > li
  background-color: $gray-lighter

  margin: 10px 2px 0 0 !important

  font-size: $font-size-base

  padding: 0

  &:first-of-type
    margin-left: 20px !important

  a
    color: darken($gray-light, 35%)

    line-height: $line-height-computed

    padding: 13px 20px

    margin: 0

    border-radius: 0

  &.active
    margin: 6px 3px -1px 0 !important

    z-index: 1

    border-top: 5px solid $tabs-accent !important

    +box-shadow($gray-lighter 0 0 5px 2px)
    a
      &,
      &:focus,
      &:hover
        border-left: 1px $gray-light solid

        border-right: 1px $gray-light solid

        margin: 0

        color: $gray-base

        background-color: $tabs-active-background

sections.description: Override of Bootstrap's pagination @see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#pagination
sections.markup:
• 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • …
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.pagination
  padding: 0

  margin: 50px 0 40px !important


  & > li
    padding: 0 !important

    margin: 0 !important

    &:before
      display: none


    & > a,
    & > span
      border: none

      border-radius: 25px !important

      color: $gray-lighter


      &:hover,
      &:active,
      &:focus
        background: none

        text-decoration: underline

        color: $gray-darker


    &.active
      & > span
       background-color: $brand-primary-dark

       color: #fff !important


    &.prev,
    &.next
      & > a
        color: $gray-darker

        line-height: 8px

        &:before,
        &:after
          font-size: 34px

          position: relative

          top: 4px

          display: inline-block


    &.prev
      & > a
        &:before
          content: "‹"

          right: 10px


    &.next
      & > a
        &:after
          content: "›"

          left: 10px


    @media (max-width: $screen-xxs-max)
      &.prev,
      &.next
        & > a
          display: block

          width: 100%

          text-align: left

      &.prev > a
          margin-bottom: 20px


      &.next > a
          margin-top: 10px
sections.renderMarkup:
• 1

sections.description: Override of Bootstrap's panels @see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#panels
sections.markup:
Panel title #1

First panel body

Panel title #2

Second panel body
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group
  .panel
    padding-bottom: 20px

    & + .panel
      margin-top: 0

      padding-top: 20px

      border-top: 1px solid $brand-primary-gray !important

      border-radius: 0

    &:last-child
      padding-bottom: 0


.panel-default
  border: none !important

  +box-shadow(none)
  .panel-heading
    padding: 0

    border-radius: 0 !important

    background: $gray-lighter

    a
      outline: 0

      text-decoration: none

  .panel-title
    padding: 15px 15px

    margin: 0

    @extend .h4

  .panel-body
    margin-top: 20px

    padding: 0

    border: none !important

    &:before,
    &:after
      display: none

    & > *
      &:last-child
        padding-bottom: 0

        margin-bottom: 0

        border-bottom: none



// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel.is-active
  .panel-heading
    background-color: $orange

    +arrow($orange, $orange, "bottom", "out", 10px, 30px)
    .panel-title
      color: #fff

      font-weight: $headings-font-weight

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

.table,
table
  font-size: $font-size-small

  & > thead > tr > th,
  & > thead > tr > td,
  & > tbody > tr > th,
  & > tbody > tr > td,
  & > tfoot > tr > th,
  & > tfoot > tr > td
    text-align: center

    vertical-align: middle

  & > thead > tr > th
    text-transform: uppercase

    font-weight: $font-weight

    background-color: $table-bg-header

    font-size: $font-size-small - 3

    line-height: $line-height-computed / 2

    padding-top: 4px

    padding-bottom: 4px

    text-align: left


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.table-bordered
  border-left: none

  border-right: none

  > thead > tr
    > th,
    > td
      border-bottom: none


.table-striped
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(odd)
    background-color: transparent

  > tbody > tr:nth-child(even)
    background-color: $table-bg-accent

sections.markup:

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.navbar
  margin: 0

  border: none

  background-color: $gray-light



// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.navbar
  // Hamburger icon
  .navbar-toggle
    float: left

    margin: 10px 15px

    width: 40px

    height: 40px

    border: 3px $brand-primary solid

    border-radius: 0

    padding: 7px

    .icon-bar
      width: 21px

      height: 4px

      border-radius: 0

      background-color: $brand-primary


  // Navigation
  .navbar-collapse
    border: none

    +breakpoint(tablet)
      padding: 0

  .navbar-nav
    font-weight: $headings-font-weight

    font-size: $font-size-small

    margin-top: 0

    margin-bottom: 0

    & > li
      padding-bottom: 0

      & > a
        color: $brand-primary-light

        text-transform: uppercase


      +breakpoint(tablet)
        & > a
          padding: 17px 20px



// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.navbar .navbar-nav
  & > li > a:hover
    color: #fff !important


  & > .active > a,
  & > .active > a:focus,
  & > li > a:active,
  & > li > a:focus
    color: #fff

    font-weight: $font-weight-medium

    +breakpoint(tablet)
      border-bottom: 5px #fff solid

      padding-bottom: 12px


  +breakpoint(tablet)
    & > li > a
      background-color: transparent !important

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.bookmark
  // position: absolute
  // top: 170px
  // right: 0
  text-align: center

  background-color: $brand-primary

  width: 50px

  border-bottom-left-radius: 15px

  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed

  text-transform: uppercase

  z-index: 100

  .icon
    +icon-size(40px)
    margin: 5px

    display: block

  +breakpoint(tablet)
    top: 205px


  +breakpoint(lg-desktop)
    top: 115px

    width: 115px

    .icon
      display: none

    .bookmark__text
      display: block

      padding: 5px 10px


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------

.bookmark__link,
.bookmark__link:hover,
.bookmark__link:visited
  color: #fff

  text-decoration: none


.bookmark__text
  display: none

  +breakpoint(lg-desktop)
    display: block

    padding: 5px 10px

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  position: relative

  padding: 20px

  margin-bottom: 30px

  background-color: $gray-lighter

  font-size: $font-size-h4

  overflow: hidden

  & > *
    z-index: 2

    position: relative

  .btn .icon
    color: $brand-primary

  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-lighter

  a
    &:hover,
    &:active,
    &:focus
      color: $gray-base

      text-decoration: none

  strong
    color: $brand-primary

  select
    background-color: #fff

  p:last-child

    margin-bottom: 0


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.box__bg
  position: absolute

  left: 10px

  top: 50%

  margin: -85px 0

  color: $gray-lighter

  z-index: 1

  font-weight: 600

  +icon-size(170px)

.box__media
  margin: 0 -20px -20px

  img
    width: 100%


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.box--icon-to-right
  .box__bg
    left: auto

    right: -50px


.box--half-icon
  &:not(.box--icon-to-right) .box__bg
    left: -50px

  &.box--icon-to-right .box__bg
    right: -105px


.box--small
  padding-top: 10px

  padding-bottom: 10px

  margin-bottom: 10px

  font-size: $font-size-base

  strong
    color: $gray-base


.box--show-more__wrapper
  overflow: hidden

  position: relative


.box--brand-primary
  background-color: $brand-primary

  color: #fff

  .box__bg
    color: $brand-primary-dark


.box--arrow-bottom
  +arrow($brand-primary, $brand-primary, "bottom", "out", 15px, 110px)
  overflow: visible


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  .middle-align
    width: 100%

  .middle-align__col
    text-align: left

  .listing__header
    margin: -20px -20px 20px

    padding: 0 20px

    background-color: $gray-lighter

    .listing__header-title
      margin: 10px 0 5px

      border: none

  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
    margin-top: 0


.box--brand-primary
  .btn .icon
    color: #fff

  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-base

    border-color: $gray-base

    color: #fff

  // Dependency on .contact component
  .contact__icon
    color: $brand-primary-lighter

    border-color: $brand-primary-lighter

  .contact__row
    padding-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2

  &.contact--listing
    padding: 15px 15px 0

    margin: 0

    border: none

    .contact
      padding: 0

      border: none

  // Dependency on .listung component
  .listing__header
    background-color: $brand-primary-dark

    border-bottom: 1px solid $brand-primary-light

    .listing__header-title
      color: #fff

  a
    color: #fff

  strong
    color: #fff


.box--light
  background-color: $almost-white

sections.description:
Widget whith date and circular diagram how much time is left. Based on example http://codepen.io/rendro/pen/qazCG. Informations are shown horizontally or vertically to not take up unnecessary space on mobile devices depending on width of wrapping element. See example below how it works inside a bootstrap collumn (marked with dashed border). Resize browser window to see the differences.

days left 17-Jun-2015
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter
  position: relative

  text-transform: uppercase

  color: $gray-base

  overflow: hidden

  text-align: left


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter__pie
  position: static

  width: 60px

  height: 60px

  padding-top: 0

  vertical-align: middle

  font-size: $font-size-small - 3px

  line-height: 26px

  canvas
    position: absolute

    left: 0

    top: 0


.counter__left
  font-size: $font-size-h3 + 6

  height: 60px

  line-height: 60px

  text-align: center

  display: block

  font-weight: bold


.counter__label
  position: absolute

  top: 10px

  left: 75px

  font-weight: 600

  line-height: 26px

  font-size: $font-size-base


.counter__caption
  position: absolute

  left: 75px

  top: 34px

  font-size: $font-size-small - 2

  br
    display: none


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter.is-big
  text-align: center

  .counter__pie
    position: relative

    width: auto

    width: 120px

    height: 120px

    margin-bottom: 5px

  .counter__left
    padding-top: 40px

    font-size: $font-size-h1

    font-weight: 700

    line-height: $line-height-computed + 2

  .counter__label
    top: 70px

    left: 0

    right: 0

    font-size: $font-size-small - 3

  .counter__caption
    position: static

    top: auto

    left: auto

    font-size: $font-size-small

    br
      display: inline


.counter--fixed-big
  width: 120px

  margin: 0 10px 10px

  float: left


.counter--open
  &.counter.is-big
    .counter__label
      top: 0

      left: 0

      right: 0

      line-height: 120px

      font-size: $font-size-h3

      font-weight: bold

    .counter__left
      display: none

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.featured
  display: table

  width: 100%

  padding-left: 0

  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.featured__item
  display: table-row

  vertical-align: middle

  &:not(:last-child)
    .featured__text,
    .featured__icon
      border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-lighter


.featured__text
  display: table-cell

  padding: 15px 20px


.featured__icon
  display: table-cell

  vertical-align: middle


.featured__circle
  width: 30px

  height: 30px

  float: right

  +circle($brand-primary)
  .icon
    +icon-size(30px)
    color: #fff

sections.description: Set of WAAT icons for any occasion. Since icons are fonts, they can be placed anywhere where text is placed and are sized automatically to match the surrounding child. Color of the icon might be declared same way as for text.
sections.css:
$waat-icons-font-path: "../images/fonts/waat-icons"


// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Import the fonts
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'

  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")

  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")



.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'

  speak: none

  font-style: normal

  font-weight: normal

  font-variant: normal

  text-transform: none

  // Better Font Rendering
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased

  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale

  // To small icons fix.
  font-size: 200%

  display: inline-block

  width: 0.5em

  height: 0

  line-height: 0

  vertical-align: text-bottom

  position: relative

  &:before
    position: absolute

    left: -0.25em

    bottom: 0.33em

sections.description: Icon or any another content to place inside the form input. It works similiar like Bootstrap Input groups, but appears inside the input, not next to it.
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon
  position: absolute

  top: 0

  right: 0

  width: $input-height-base

  height: $input-height-base

  line-height: $input-height-base

  text-align: center


.input-lg + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-large


.input-sm + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-small


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon__wrapper
  position: relative

  color: $brand-primary

  input
    padding-right: 30px


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon .icon
  font-size: $font-size-base * 2

sections.css:
$listing-media-width: 160px


// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing
  margin-bottom: 20px



// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__item
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid

  padding-bottom: 30px

  padding-top: 30px

  overflow: hidden

  &:last-child
    padding-bottom: 0

    border-bottom: none


  p
    margin: 0

    text-align: justify



.listing__item-column-second
  width: 100%

  margin-bottom: 10px

  text-align: center



.listing__item-text
  overflow: hidden



.listing__item-title
  margin-top: 0

  a
    color: $gray-base


  h2, h3
    margin: 0 !important




.listing__item-meta
  font-size: $font-size-small

  color: $gray-light

  width: 100%

  margin-bottom: 10px

  display: block



.listing__item-footer
  margin-top: $line-height-computed / 2

  overflow: hidden



.listing__icon
  color: $brand-primary

  font-size: $font-size-large

  position: relative

  top: 2px



+breakpoint(phone)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: left

    margin-right: 30px

    max-width: $listing-media-width

    overflow: hidden


    .listing__item-media-icon
      width: 40px

      height: 40px

      background-color: $gray-lightest

      text-align: center

      .icon
        +icon-size(40px)
        margin-top: -6px


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--column-second-above
  .listing__item-column-second
    max-width: none

    float: none

    margin-right: 0

    margin-bottom: 20px

    width: 100%

    img
      width: 100%


.listing--column-sec-above-md
  +breakpoint(tablet, tablet)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: none


.listing--zebra
  .listing__item:nth-of-type(even)
    background-color: $gray-lightest



.listing--no-separators
  .listing__item
    border-bottom: none

    padding-bottom: 0



.listing--2-col-layout,
.listing--3-col-layout,
.listing--4-col-layout
  +make-row()
  .listing__item
    border: none

    padding-bottom: 0

  .listing__item-column-main
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid

    padding-bottom: 40px

  .listing__item-title
    min-height: 60px

  p
    padding: 0


.listing--2-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(6)

.listing--3-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(4)

.listing--4-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(3)


// Numbered listing

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--numbered
  counter-reset: listing--numbered

  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 10px, 50px)
    margin: 35px 0 15px 80px

    padding-bottom: 0

    position: relative

    overflow: visible

    border-bottom: none


  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 55px

    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed

    &:before
      content: counter(listing--numbered)

      counter-increment: listing--numbered

      position: absolute

      left: -80px

      top: 50%

      width: 80px

      height: 60px

      margin: -30px 0

      text-align: center

      font-size: $font-size-h1 * 4/5


    p:not(:last-child)

      margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2



  .listing__item-title
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2

    font-size: $font-size-h3 + 3


  .listing__item-footer
    background-color: $gray-lightest

    padding: 0 10px 0 35px

    a, button
      color: $brand-primary


.listing--numbered.listing--condensed
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 5px, 10px)
    padding: 5px 10px 5px 0

    margin: 5px 0 5px 30px


  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 30px

    margin-bottom: 0

    &:before
      left: -30px

      width: 30px

      height: 20px

      margin: -20px 0

      font-size: $font-size-large

      text-align: left



// Notifications listing
//

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles
  display: table

  list-style-type: none

  padding: 0


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  display: table-cell

  &:not(:last-child) .nav-sectiontitles__link
    padding-right: 30px


.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  & > .nav-sectiontitles__link,
  & > * > .nav-sectiontitles__link
    font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed

    text-transform: uppercase

    color: $gray-base

    .icon
      display: none


.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item .nav-sectiontitles__link
  font-weight: $font-weight

  color: $gray-base


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles .dropdown
  position: relative

  .dropdown-menu
    position: absolute !important

    background-color: $gray-lighter

    font-size: $font-size-small

    border-radius: 0

    padding: 1px 0 0

    width: 215px

    margin-left: -72px

    top: 91px

    border-bottom: 10px solid $brand-primary

    .nav-sectiontitles__item
      padding-bottom: 0

      &:not(:last-child)
        border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light

      .dropdown
        padding: 15px 0

    .nav-sectiontitles__link
      padding: 15px 20px

      text-decoration: none

      &:hover
        background: none

    .nav-sectiontitles__item:hover
      background-color: $brand-primary

      font-weight: $headings-font-weight

      .nav-sectiontitles__link
        color: #fff

    // Deeper dropdown level.
    .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
      background-color: $brand-primary

      top: 0

      left: 100%

      margin-top: 0

      margin-left: -1px

      border: none

      .nav-sectiontitles__item
        border-color: $brand-primary-dark

        &:hover
          background-color: $brand-primary-dark

    .dropdown:hover>.dropdown-menu
      display: block


// Deeeper level of last item displayed at left instead of right.
.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item:last-child .dropdown-menu .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  left: -100%


.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item > .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  +arrow($gray-light, $gray-lighter, "top", "out", 10px, 102px)

.nav-sectiontitles .ornament:before
  margin-bottom: 5px

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles
  background-color: $brand-primary

  padding: 0

  margin: 0

  list-style-type: none


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles__item
  display: block

  padding-bottom: 0


.nav-tiles__link
  display: block


.nav-tiles__label
  display: block


.nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
  float: left

  width: 40px

  height: 40px

  margin: 5px 20px 5px 0

  position: relative

  display: inline-block

  +circle($brand-primary-light)
  .icon
    position: absolute

    margin: -17px

    top: 50%

    left: 50%

    color: $gray-base

    +icon-size(35px)

.nav-tiles__item
  &:not(:last-child)
    border-bottom: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)

  .nav-tiles__link
    text-align: left

    overflow: hidden

    color: #fff

    text-transform: uppercase

    height: 50px

    line-height: 50px

    padding: 0 20px

    margin: 0

    border-radius: 0


+breakpoint(tablet)
  .nav-tiles
    display: table

    width: 100%

    table-layout: fixed

  .nav-tiles__item
    border-bottom: none

    display: table-cell

    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)

  .nav-tiles__label
    text-align: center



@media (min-width: $screen-sm-min) and (max-width: $screen-sm-max)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    display: block

    margin-left: auto

    margin-right: auto

    float: none

  .nav-tiles__item .nav-tiles__link
    height: 80px

  .nav-tiles__label
    line-height: $line-height-computed


+breakpoint(desktop)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    width: 50px

    height: 50px

    margin: 10px 0

    .icon
      margin: -19.5px

      +icon-size(40px)
  .nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item
    vertical-align: middle

    .nav-tiles__link
      display: table

      width: 100%

      height: 70px

      line-height: $line-height-computed

  .nav-tiles__icon-collumn,
  .nav-tiles__label-collumn
    display: table-cell

    vertical-align: middle

  .nav-tiles__label
    padding: 0 10px

    max-height: 70px

    overflow: hidden



// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:hover,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:focus,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link.active,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item.active-trail
  text-decoration: none

  background-color: darken($brand-primary, 6%)

  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    +circle(darken($brand-primary-light, 4%))

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel
  +make-row

  +no-gutters

  position: relative


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__inner-wrapper
  +make-md-column(9)

.news-carousel__item
  display: table

  width: 100%

  height: $news-carousel-height


.news-carousel__item-row
  display: table-row

  width: 100%

  height: $news-carousel-height

  overflow: hidden


.news-carousel__item-text
  display: table-cell

  background: $orange url("../images/png/angle-gradient.png") center top no-repeat

  padding: 30px

  vertical-align: top

  &, *, a
    color: #fff


.news-carousel__item-media
  display: table-cell

  max-height: 400px

  overflow: hidden


.news-carousel__item-title
  border: none

  margin-top: 0

  &:before,
  &:after
    content: none !important


.news-carousel__list-group
  +make-md-column(3)

.news-carousel__list-group-item
  border-radius: 0px !important

  border: none

  cursor: pointer

  width: 100%

  padding: 0

  display: table

  box-sizing: content-box

  &:not(:last-child)
    margin-bottom: 1px


.news-carousel__list-group-label
  display: table-cell

  height: 70px

  padding: 5px 20px

  vertical-align: middle

  font-size: 14px

  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed


.news-carousel__show-all
  margin: 10px 10px 0 0


.news-carousel__controls
  position: absolute

  top: 0

  right: 0


.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  width: 40px

  height: 40px

  line-height: 40px

  background: $brand-primary

  color: #fff

  display: block

  float: left

  text-align: center

  .icon
    +icon-size(20px)

.news-carousel__controls-left
  margin-right: 1px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__list-group-item
  &.active
    background-color: $orange

    margin-left: -20px

    padding-left: 20px

  &.active,
  &.active *
    color: #fff

  &:hover,
  &:hover *
    color: #fff

    background-color: $orange !important


.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  &:hover
    color: $brand-primary-light

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.live
  position: absolute

  top: -5px

  left: -5px

  width: 85px

  height: 85px

  overflow: hidden



// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.live__container
  position: relative


.live__inner
  background-color: $red

  text-align: center

  text-transform: uppercase

  padding: 3px 0

  width: 120px

  left: -27px

  top: 21px

  position: relative

  font-weight: $font-weight-medium

  color: #fff

  transform: rotate(-45deg)

  box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px $gray-light

  &:before,
  &:after
    content: ''

    border-top: 4px solid $gray-base

    border-left: 4px solid transparent

    border-right: 4px solid transparent

    position: absolute

    bottom: -4px

  &:before
    left: 0

  &:after
    right: 0

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item,
.timeline__legend
  display: table

  width: 100%


.timeline__legend
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed * 0.667


.timeline__time,
.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-time,
.timeline__legend-text,
  display: table-cell


.timeline__time,
.timeline__legend-time
  width: 70px

  padding: 0 20px 0 0

  text-align: left

  +breakpoint(tablet)
    width: 125px

    text-align: right

  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 40px 0 0



.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-text
  padding: 0 0 0 20px

  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 0 0 40px


.timeline__text
  border-left: 1px $gray-lighter solid

  position: relative

  &:before
    content: ''

    display: block

    width: 20px

    height: 20px

    position: absolute

    top: 1px

    left: -10px

    background-color: $brand-primary

    border: 6px #fff solid

    border-radius: 50%


.timeline__title
  font-size: $font-size-large

  font-weight: $font-weight-medium

  margin: 0

  text-transform: uppercase


.timeline__description
  width: 100%

  padding-bottom: 20px

  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid

  margin-bottom: 20px

  p
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 3

    &:last-child
      margin: 0


// Last item styling
.timeline__item:last-of-type
  .timeline__text
    border: none

  .timeline__description
    border: none

    padding: 0



// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item--past
  &, .timeline__title
    color: $gray-light

  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $gray-light


.timeline__item--now
  .timeline__time
    font-weight: $font-weight-medium

  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $yellow



// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__legend .label-default
  background-color: $gray-lighter

  font-size: $font-size-xsmall

  white-space: normal

sections.markup: Switch me
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch
  display: inline-block


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__legend
  height: 30px

  line-height: 30px

  display: inline-block

  float: left

  margin-right: 10px

.switch__label
  cursor: pointer

  width: 60px

  height: 30px

  position: relative

  &:before
    // Coloured background.
    content: ''

    display: block

    width: 100%

    height: 100%

    position: absolute

    background: $gray-lighter

    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)

    transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out

    border-radius: 15px

  &:after
    // Dot.
    background: #fff

    height: 28px

    left: 1px

    top: 1px

    position: absolute

    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out

    width: 30px

    border-radius: 50%

    // Inside dot.
    content: '|||'

    font-size: 10px

    text-align: center

    line-height: 27px

    letter-spacing: -2px

    text-indent: -1px

    color: $gray-lighter


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__input
  display: none

  &:checked
    & + label:before
      // Coloured background.
      background: $brand-success

      opacity: 1

    & + label:after
      // Dot.
      left: 29px

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  background-color: #0d66a0

  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

  overflow: visible


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header__top
  background-color: #fff

  padding-top: 5px

  height: 50px

  #boxes-box-header_top_text
    color: #0065a2

    margin-top: 20px

    text-transform: uppercase

    font-size: 18px

    font-weight: 400


.section--header__bottom
  #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    color: #fff

    font-size: 13px

    font-weight: 400

    margin: 5px 0


.section--header__breadcrumb
    background-color: #074A8B

    padding: 3px 0 2px


.section--header__logo
    display: block

    width: 90px

    height: 62px

    background: url("../images/svg/ec-logo.svg") no-repeat

    margin: 0 10px 0 0

    position: relative

    z-index: 1


+breakpoint(desktop)
  .section--header__top
    height: auto

    #boxes-box-header_top_text
      margin-top: 60px

      font-size: 24px

  .section--header__logo
    width: 172px

    height: 118px

    margin: 10px 35px -35px 0

  .section--header__bottom #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    margin: 5px 0 20px 208px

    font-size: 16px


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  .nav-horizontal
    margin: 0 0 -30px

    .nav-horizontal__item
      font-size: 11px

      font-weight: normal

      border-right: 1px #4677a8 solid

      line-height: 1em

      padding: 0 3px 0 0 !important

      margin: 0 !important

      &:last-of-type
        padding: 0

        margin: 0

        border-right: 0


    .nav-horizontal__link
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: #396ea2


.section--header__breadcrumb
  .breadcrumb
    background-color: transparent

    color: #fff

    border-radius: 0

    font-size: 0 // display-inline margins fix

    font-weight: normal

    margin: 0

    padding: 0

  .breadcrumb ol

  .breadcrumb li
    font-size: 11px

    margin: 0


  .breadcrumb li > a
    color: #fff

    &:hover,
    &:focus
      color: #fff


  .breadcrumb > li + li:before
    @extend .glyphicon

    @extend .glyphicon-menu-right:before

    font-size: 8px

    padding: 0 3px 0 1px

    color: #fff


  .breadcrumb > .active
    color: #fff

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills
  // Fix for centering pills with text-center class in parent element.
  display: inline-block

  > li
    & > a
      color: $gray-light

      &:hover
        background-color: transparent

        color: $text-color

    // Active state
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-color

        background-color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills--large
  > li > a
    font-family: $headings-font-family

    font-size: $font-size-h2


.nav-pills--arrows
  &:after
    border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light

    width: 100%

  > li
    margin-bottom: -1px

    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        +arrow($gray-light, white, "bottom", "in", 10px, 25px)
        background: transparent

        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs
  border: none

  margin: -8px 0 0

  overflow: hidden

  text-transform: uppercase

  font-weight: $headings-font-weight

  // z-index configuration for .listing--tabs-spacer class of included view.
  position: relative

  z-index: 1

  &:after
    content: ''

    width: 100%

    display: block

    border-bottom: 1px $gray-light solid

    position: absolute

    bottom: 0


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs > li
  background-color: $gray-lighter

  margin: 10px 2px 0 0 !important

  font-size: $font-size-base

  padding: 0

  &:first-of-type
    margin-left: 20px !important

  a
    color: darken($gray-light, 35%)

    line-height: $line-height-computed

    padding: 13px 20px

    margin: 0

    border-radius: 0

  &.active
    margin: 6px 3px -1px 0 !important

    z-index: 1

    border-top: 5px solid $tabs-accent !important

    +box-shadow($gray-lighter 0 0 5px 2px)
    a
      &,
      &:focus,
      &:hover
        border-left: 1px $gray-light solid

        border-right: 1px $gray-light solid

        margin: 0

        color: $gray-base

        background-color: $tabs-active-background

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.pagination
  padding: 0

  margin: 50px 0 40px !important


  & > li
    padding: 0 !important

    margin: 0 !important

    &:before
      display: none


    & > a,
    & > span
      border: none

      border-radius: 25px !important

      color: $gray-lighter


      &:hover,
      &:active,
      &:focus
        background: none

        text-decoration: underline

        color: $gray-darker


    &.active
      & > span
       background-color: $brand-primary-dark

       color: #fff !important


    &.prev,
    &.next
      & > a
        color: $gray-darker

        line-height: 8px

        &:before,
        &:after
          font-size: 34px

          position: relative

          top: 4px

          display: inline-block


    &.prev
      & > a
        &:before
          content: "‹"

          right: 10px


    &.next
      & > a
        &:after
          content: "›"

          left: 10px


    @media (max-width: $screen-xxs-max)
      &.prev,
      &.next
        & > a
          display: block

          width: 100%

          text-align: left

      &.prev > a
          margin-bottom: 20px


      &.next > a
          margin-top: 10px

// Component

.table,
table
  font-size: $font-size-small

  & > thead > tr > th,
  & > thead > tr > td,
  & > tbody > tr > th,
  & > tbody > tr > td,
  & > tfoot > tr > th,

    > td

.table-striped

    background-color: transparent

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.navbar
  margin: 0

  border: none

  background-color: $gray-light



// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.navbar
  // Hamburger icon

    float: left

    margin: 10px 15px

    border-radius: 0

  & > .active > a:focus,

  & > li > a:focus
    color: #fff

    +breakpoint(tablet)
      border-bottom: 5px #fff solid

      padding-bottom: 12px

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  position: relative

  padding: 20px

  margin-bottom: 30px

  background-color: $gray-lighter

  font-size: $font-size-h4

  overflow: hidden

  & > *
    z-index: 2

    position: relative

  .btn .icon
    color: $brand-primary

  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-lighter

  a
    &:hover,
    &:active,
    &:focus
      color: $gray-base

      text-decoration: none

  strong
    color: $brand-primary

  select
    background-color: #fff

  p:last-child

    margin-bottom: 0


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.box__bg
  position: absolute

  left: 10px

  top: 50%

  margin: -85px 0

  color: $gray-lighter

  z-index: 1

  font-weight: 600

  +icon-size(170px)

.box__media
  margin: 0 -20px -20px

  img
    width: 100%


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.box--icon-to-right
  .box__bg
    left: auto

    right: -50px


.box--half-icon
  &:not(.box--icon-to-right) .box__bg
    left: -50px

  &.box--icon-to-right .box__bg
    right: -105px


.box--small
  padding-top: 10px

  padding-bottom: 10px

  margin-bottom: 10px

  font-size: $font-size-base

  strong
    color: $gray-base


.box--show-more__wrapper
  overflow: hidden

  position: relative


.box--brand-primary
  background-color: $brand-primary

  color: #fff

  .box__bg
    color: $brand-primary-dark


.box--arrow-bottom
  +arrow($brand-primary, $brand-primary, "bottom", "out", 15px, 110px)
  overflow: visible


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  .middle-align
    width: 100%

  .middle-align__col
    text-align: left

  .listing__header
    margin: -20px -20px 20px

    padding: 0 20px

    background-color: $gray-lighter

    .listing__header-title
      margin: 10px 0 5px

      border: none

  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
    margin-top: 0


.box--brand-primary
  .btn .icon
    color: #fff

  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-base

    border-color: $gray-base

    color: #fff

  // Dependency on .contact component
  .contact__icon
    color: $brand-primary-lighter

    border-color: $brand-primary-lighter

  .contact__row
    padding-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2

  &.contact--listing
    padding: 15px 15px 0

    margin: 0

    border: none

    .contact
      padding: 0

      border: none

  // Dependency on .listung component
  .listing__header
    background-color: $brand-primary-dark

    border-bottom: 1px solid $brand-primary-light

    .listing__header-title
      color: #fff

  a
    color: #fff

  strong
    color: #fff


.box--light
  background-color: $almost-white

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter
  position: relative

  text-transform: uppercase

  color: $gray-base

  overflow: hidden

  text-align: left


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter__pie
  position: static

  width: 60px

  height: 60px

  padding-top: 0

  vertical-align: middle

  font-size: $font-size-small - 3px

  line-height: 26px

  canvas
    position: absolute

    left: 0

    top: 0


.counter__left
  font-size: $font-size-h3 + 6

  height: 60px

  line-height: 60px

  text-align: center

  display: block

  font-weight: bold


.counter__label
  position: absolute

  top: 10px

  left: 75px

  font-weight: 600

  line-height: 26px

  font-size: $font-size-base


.counter__caption
  position: absolute

  left: 75px

  top: 34px

  font-size: $font-size-small - 2

  br
    display: none


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter.is-big
  text-align: center

  .counter__pie
    position: relative

    width: auto

    width: 120px

    height: 120px

    margin-bottom: 5px

  .counter__left
    padding-top: 40px

    font-size: $font-size-h1

    font-weight: 700

    line-height: $line-height-computed + 2

  .counter__label
    top: 70px

    left: 0

    right: 0

    font-size: $font-size-small - 3

  .counter__caption
    position: static

    top: auto

    left: auto

    font-size: $font-size-small

    br
      display: inline


.counter--fixed-big
  width: 120px

  margin: 0 10px 10px

  float: left


.counter--open
  &.counter.is-big
    .counter__label
      top: 0

      left: 0

      right: 0

      line-height: 120px

      font-size: $font-size-h3

      font-weight: bold

    .counter__left
      display: none

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.featured
  display: table

  width: 100%

  padding-left: 0

  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.featured__item
  display: table-row

  vertical-align: middle

  &:not(:last-child)
    .featured__text,
    .featured__icon
      border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-lighter


.featured__text
  display: table-cell

  padding: 15px 20px


.featured__icon
  display: table-cell

  vertical-align: middle


.featured__circle
  width: 30px

  height: 30px

  float: right

  +circle($brand-primary)
  .icon
    +icon-size(30px)
    color: #fff

section.description: Set of WAAT icons for any occasion. Since icons are fonts, they can be placed anywhere where text is placed and are sized automatically to match the surrounding child. Color of the icon might be declared same way as for text.
section.css:
$waat-icons-font-path: "../images/fonts/waat-icons"


// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Import the fonts
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'

  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")

  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")



.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'

  speak: none

  font-style: normal

  font-weight: normal

  font-variant: normal

  text-transform: none

  // Better Font Rendering
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased

  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale

  // To small icons fix.
  font-size: 200%

  display: inline-block

  width: 0.5em

  height: 0

  line-height: 0

  vertical-align: text-bottom

  position: relative

  &:before
    position: absolute

    left: -0.25em

    bottom: 0.33em

section.description: Icon or any another content to place inside the form input. It works similiar like Bootstrap Input groups, but appears inside the input, not next to it.
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon
  position: absolute

  top: 0

  right: 0

  width: $input-height-base

  height: $input-height-base

  line-height: $input-height-base

  text-align: center


.input-lg + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-large


.input-sm + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-small


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon__wrapper
  position: relative

  color: $brand-primary

  input
    padding-right: 30px


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon .icon
  font-size: $font-size-base * 2

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing
  margin-bottom: 20px



// Elements

.listing__item
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid

  padding-top: 30px

  overflow: hidden

    padding-bottom: 0

    border-bottom: none


  p
    margin: 0

    text-align: justify



.listing__item-column-second
  width: 100%

  margin-bottom: 10px

  text-align: center



.listing__item-text
  overflow: hidden



.listing__item-title
  margin-top: 0

  a
    color: $gray-base


  h2, h3
    margin: 0 !important




.listing__item-meta
  font-size: $font-size-small

  color: $gray-light

  width: 100%

  margin-bottom: 10px

  display: block



.listing__item-footer
  margin-top: $line-height-computed / 2

  overflow: hidden



.listing__icon
  color: $brand-primary

  font-size: $font-size-large

  position: relative

  top: 2px



+breakpoint(phone)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: left

    margin-right: 30px

    max-width: $listing-media-width

    overflow: hidden


    .listing__item-media-icon
      width: 40px

      height: 40px

      background-color: $gray-lightest

      text-align: center

      .icon
        +icon-size(40px)
        margin-top: -6px


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--column-second-above
  .listing__item-column-second
    max-width: none

    float: none

    margin-right: 0

    margin-bottom: 20px

    width: 100%

    img
      width: 100%


.listing--column-sec-above-md
  +breakpoint(tablet, tablet)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: none


.listing--zebra
  .listing__item:nth-of-type(even)
    background-color: $gray-lightest



.listing--no-separators
  .listing__item
    border-bottom: none

    padding-bottom: 0



.listing--2-col-layout,
.listing--3-col-layout,
.listing--4-col-layout
  +make-row()
  .listing__item
    border: none

    padding-bottom: 0

  .listing__item-column-main
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid

    padding-bottom: 40px

  .listing__item-title
    min-height: 60px

  p
    padding: 0


.listing--2-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(6)

.listing--3-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(4)

.listing--4-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(3)


// Numbered listing

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--numbered
  counter-reset: listing--numbered

  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 10px, 50px)
    margin: 35px 0 15px 80px

    padding-bottom: 0

    position: relative

    overflow: visible

    border-bottom: none


  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 55px

    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed

    &:before
      content: counter(listing--numbered)

      counter-increment: listing--numbered

      position: absolute

      left: -80px

      top: 50%

      width: 80px

      height: 60px

      margin: -30px 0

      text-align: center

      font-size: $font-size-h1 * 4/5


    p:not(:last-child)

      margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2



  .listing__item-title
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2

    font-size: $font-size-h3 + 3


  .listing__item-footer
    background-color: $gray-lightest

    padding: 0 10px 0 35px

    a, button
      color: $brand-primary


.listing--numbered.listing--condensed
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 5px, 10px)
    padding: 5px 10px 5px 0

    margin: 5px 0 5px 30px


  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 30px

    margin-bottom: 0

    &:before
      left: -30px

      width: 30px

      height: 20px

      margin: -20px 0

      font-size: $font-size-large

      text-align: left



// Notifications listing
//

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles
  display: table

  list-style-type: none

  padding: 0


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  display: table-cell

  &:not(:last-child) .nav-sectiontitles__link
    padding-right: 30px


.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  & > .nav-sectiontitles__link,
  & > * > .nav-sectiontitles__link
    font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed

    text-transform: uppercase

    color: $gray-base

    .icon
      display: none


.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item .nav-sectiontitles__link
  font-weight: $font-weight

  color: $gray-base


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles .dropdown
  position: relative

  .dropdown-menu
    position: absolute !important

    background-color: $gray-lighter

    font-size: $font-size-small

    border-radius: 0

    padding: 1px 0 0

    width: 215px

    margin-left: -72px

    top: 91px

    border-bottom: 10px solid $brand-primary

    .nav-sectiontitles__item
      padding-bottom: 0

      &:not(:last-child)
        border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light

      .dropdown
        padding: 15px 0

    .nav-sectiontitles__link
      padding: 15px 20px

      text-decoration: none

      &:hover
        background: none

    .nav-sectiontitles__item:hover
      background-color: $brand-primary

      font-weight: $headings-font-weight

      .nav-sectiontitles__link
        color: #fff

    // Deeper dropdown level.
    .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
      background-color: $brand-primary

      top: 0

      left: 100%

      margin-top: 0

      margin-left: -1px

      border: none

      .nav-sectiontitles__item
        border-color: $brand-primary-dark

        &:hover
          background-color: $brand-primary-dark

    .dropdown:hover>.dropdown-menu
      display: block


// Deeeper level of last item displayed at left instead of right.
.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item:last-child .dropdown-menu .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  left: -100%


.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item > .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  +arrow($gray-light, $gray-lighter, "top", "out", 10px, 102px)

.nav-sectiontitles .ornament:before
  margin-bottom: 5px

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles
  background-color: $brand-primary

  padding: 0

  margin: 0

  list-style-type: none


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles__item
  display: block

  padding-bottom: 0


.nav-tiles__link
  display: block


.nav-tiles__label
  display: block


.nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
  float: left

  width: 40px

  height: 40px

  margin: 5px 20px 5px 0

  position: relative

  display: inline-block

  +circle($brand-primary-light)
  .icon
    position: absolute

    margin: -17px

    top: 50%

    left: 50%

    color: $gray-base

    +icon-size(35px)

.nav-tiles__item
  &:not(:last-child)
    border-bottom: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)

  .nav-tiles__link
    text-align: left

    overflow: hidden

    color: #fff

    text-transform: uppercase

    height: 50px

    line-height: 50px

    padding: 0 20px

    margin: 0

    border-radius: 0


+breakpoint(tablet)
  .nav-tiles
    display: table

    width: 100%

    table-layout: fixed

  .nav-tiles__item
    border-bottom: none

    display: table-cell

    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)

  .nav-tiles__label
    text-align: center



@media (min-width: $screen-sm-min) and (max-width: $screen-sm-max)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    display: block

    margin-left: auto

    margin-right: auto

    float: none

  .nav-tiles__item .nav-tiles__link
    height: 80px

  .nav-tiles__label
    line-height: $line-height-computed


+breakpoint(desktop)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    width: 50px

    height: 50px

    margin: 10px 0

    .icon
      margin: -19.5px

      +icon-size(40px)
  .nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item
    vertical-align: middle

    .nav-tiles__link
      display: table

      width: 100%

      height: 70px

      line-height: $line-height-computed

  .nav-tiles__icon-collumn,
  .nav-tiles__label-collumn
    display: table-cell

    vertical-align: middle

  .nav-tiles__label
    padding: 0 10px

    max-height: 70px

    overflow: hidden



// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:hover,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:focus,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link.active,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item.active-trail
  text-decoration: none

  background-color: darken($brand-primary, 6%)

  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    +circle(darken($brand-primary-light, 4%))

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel
  +make-row

  +no-gutters

  position: relative


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__inner-wrapper
  +make-md-column(9)

.news-carousel__item
  display: table

  width: 100%

  height: $news-carousel-height


.news-carousel__item-row
  display: table-row

  width: 100%

  height: $news-carousel-height

  overflow: hidden


.news-carousel__item-text
  display: table-cell

  background: $orange url("../images/png/angle-gradient.png") center top no-repeat

  padding: 30px

  vertical-align: top

  &, *, a
    color: #fff


.news-carousel__item-media
  display: table-cell

  max-height: 400px

  overflow: hidden


.news-carousel__item-title
  border: none

  margin-top: 0

  &:before,
  &:after
    content: none !important


.news-carousel__list-group
  +make-md-column(3)

.news-carousel__list-group-item
  border-radius: 0px !important

  border: none

  cursor: pointer

  width: 100%

  padding: 0

  display: table

  box-sizing: content-box

  &:not(:last-child)
    margin-bottom: 1px


.news-carousel__list-group-label
  display: table-cell

  height: 70px

  padding: 5px 20px

  vertical-align: middle

  font-size: 14px

  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed


.news-carousel__show-all
  margin: 10px 10px 0 0


.news-carousel__controls
  position: absolute

  top: 0

  right: 0


.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  width: 40px

  height: 40px

  line-height: 40px

  background: $brand-primary

  color: #fff

  display: block

  float: left

  text-align: center

  .icon
    +icon-size(20px)

.news-carousel__controls-left
  margin-right: 1px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__list-group-item
  &.active
    background-color: $orange

    margin-left: -20px

    padding-left: 20px

  &.active,
  &.active *
    color: #fff

  &:hover,
  &:hover *
    color: #fff

    background-color: $orange !important


.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  &:hover
    color: $brand-primary-light

.social-links
  line-height: $line-height-computed * 0.65

section.markup: Live
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.live
  position: absolute

  top: -5px

  left: -5px

  width: 85px

  height: 85px

  overflow: hidden



// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.live__container
  position: relative


.live__inner
  background-color: $red

  text-align: center

  text-transform: uppercase

  padding: 3px 0

  width: 120px

  left: -27px

  top: 21px

  position: relative

  font-weight: $font-weight-medium

  color: #fff

  transform: rotate(-45deg)

  box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px $gray-light

  &:before,
  &:after
    content: ''

    border-top: 4px solid $gray-base

    border-left: 4px solid transparent

    border-right: 4px solid transparent

    position: absolute

    bottom: -4px

  &:before
    left: 0

  &:after
    right: 0
section.renderMarkup: Live

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item,
.timeline__legend
  display: table

  width: 100%


.timeline__legend
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed * 0.667


.timeline__time,
.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-time,
.timeline__legend-text,
  display: table-cell


.timeline__time,
.timeline__legend-time
  width: 70px

  padding: 0 20px 0 0

  text-align: left

  +breakpoint(tablet)
    width: 125px

    text-align: right

  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 40px 0 0



.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-text
  padding: 0 0 0 20px

  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 0 0 40px


.timeline__text
  border-left: 1px $gray-lighter solid

  position: relative

  &:before
    content: ''

    display: block

    width: 20px

    height: 20px

    position: absolute

    top: 1px

    left: -10px

    background-color: $brand-primary

    border: 6px #fff solid

    border-radius: 50%


.timeline__title
  font-size: $font-size-large

  font-weight: $font-weight-medium

  margin: 0

  text-transform: uppercase


.timeline__description
  width: 100%

  padding-bottom: 20px

  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid

  margin-bottom: 20px

  p
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 3

    &:last-child
      margin: 0


// Last item styling
.timeline__item:last-of-type
  .timeline__text
    border: none

  .timeline__description
    border: none

    padding: 0



// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item--past
  &, .timeline__title
    color: $gray-light

  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $gray-light


.timeline__item--now
  .timeline__time
    font-weight: $font-weight-medium

  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $yellow



// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__legend .label-default
  background-color: $gray-lighter

  font-size: $font-size-xsmall

  white-space: normal

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.infobox
  position: relative

  padding: 0

  border: none

  text-transform: none

  text-align: inherit

  font-size: inherit



// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.infobox__icon
  position: absolute

  top: 0

  left: 0

  width: 50px

  height: 50px

  padding: 5px

  background-color: $brand-primary

  color: #fff


.infobox__inner
  padding: 30px 45px

  margin-left: 50px

  background-color: #fff

  border-left: 5px solid $brand-primary

  &:before
    content: ''

    display: block

    position: absolute

    width: 0

    height: 0

    top: 0

    left: 50px

    border-bottom: 15px solid transparent

    border-left: 15px solid $brand-primary

  h3
    margin-top: 0

  p
    margin: 0



// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.infobox
  .infobox__icon .icon
    +icon-size(40px)
  .block__title
    font-size: $font-size-h3 + 2

    padding-bottom: 10px

    text-transform: none

  .listing
    margin: 0



// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.infobox--yellow
  .infobox__icon
    background-color: $yellow

  .infobox__inner,
  .infobox__inner:before
    border-left-color: $yellow

section.markup: 10 February 2016
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.ribbon
  position: absolute

  bottom: 20px

  left: -15px

  font-weight: $font-weight-medium

  +opacity(0.90)
  &:before
    content: ''

    position: absolute

    top: 100%

    left: 0

    border-width: 5px 8px

    border-style: solid

    border-color: $brand-primary-dark $brand-primary-dark transparent transparent



// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.ribbon__inner
  padding: 8px 13px 10px

  margin-right: 10px

  background-color: $brand-primary

  text-align: left

  float: left

  color: #fff

  display: inline-block


.ribbon__container
  position: relative



// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.ribbon
  .icon
    +icon-size($font-size-base * 2)
    top: 7px

  .btn-lg
    margin: 0 -2px

    padding: 12px 20px 11px

    float: left



// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.ribbon--active .ribbon__inner
  background-color: $yellow

  color: $gray-base
section.renderMarkup: 10 February 2016

section.markup: Switch me
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch
  display: inline-block


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__legend
  height: 30px

  line-height: 30px

  display: inline-block

  float: left

  margin-right: 10px

.switch__label
  cursor: pointer

  width: 60px

  height: 30px

  position: relative

  &:before
    // Coloured background.
    content: ''

    display: block

    width: 100%

    height: 100%

    position: absolute

    background: $gray-lighter

    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)

    transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out

    border-radius: 15px

  &:after
    // Dot.
    background: #fff

    height: 28px

    left: 1px

    top: 1px

    position: absolute

    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out

    width: 30px

    border-radius: 50%

    // Inside dot.
    content: '|||'

    font-size: 10px

    text-align: center

    line-height: 27px

    letter-spacing: -2px

    text-indent: -1px

    color: $gray-lighter


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__input
  display: none

  &:checked
    & + label:before
      // Coloured background.
      background: $brand-success

      opacity: 1

    & + label:after
      // Dot.
      left: 29px
section.renderMarkup: Switch me

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.cloudlet
  background-color: $gray-lightest

  position: relative

  margin: 0 20px 20px 0

  +middle-align

  &:before
    content: ''

    display: block

    position: absolute

    width: 0

    height: 0

    top: 0

    right: -20px + 1

    border-bottom: 20px solid transparent

    border-left: 20px solid $gray-lightest



// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.cloudlet__col
  padding: 15px 25px

  &:not(:last-of-type)
    border-right: 1px #fff solid

  h3
    margin: 0



// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.cloudlet .icon
  margin-left: -15px

  margin-right: -20px

  color: $brand-primary-light

  +icon-size($font-size-base * 4)


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.cloudlet--is-active
  border-left: 5px solid $brand-primary

  margin-left: -5px



// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.cloudlet--fullwidth
  width: 100%

  box-sizing: content-box

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  background-color: #0d66a0

  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

  overflow: visible


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header__top
  background-color: #fff

  padding-top: 5px

  height: 50px

  #boxes-box-header_top_text
    color: #0065a2

    margin-top: 20px

    text-transform: uppercase

    font-size: 18px

    font-weight: 400


.section--header__bottom
  #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    color: #fff

    font-size: 13px

    font-weight: 400

    margin: 5px 0


.section--header__breadcrumb
    background-color: #074A8B

    padding: 3px 0 2px


.section--header__logo
    display: block

    width: 90px

    height: 62px

    background: url("../images/svg/ec-logo.svg") no-repeat

    margin: 0 10px 0 0

    position: relative

    z-index: 1


+breakpoint(desktop)
  .section--header__top
    height: auto

    #boxes-box-header_top_text
      margin-top: 60px

      font-size: 24px

  .section--header__logo
    width: 172px

    height: 118px

    margin: 10px 35px -35px 0

  .section--header__bottom #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    margin: 5px 0 20px 208px

    font-size: 16px


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  .nav-horizontal
    margin: 0 0 -30px

    .nav-horizontal__item
      font-size: 11px

      font-weight: normal

      border-right: 1px #4677a8 solid

      line-height: 1em

      padding: 0 3px 0 0 !important

      margin: 0 !important

      &:last-of-type
        padding: 0

        margin: 0

        border-right: 0


    .nav-horizontal__link
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: #396ea2


.section--header__breadcrumb
  .breadcrumb
    background-color: transparent

    color: #fff

    border-radius: 0

    font-size: 0 // display-inline margins fix

    font-weight: normal

    margin: 0

    padding: 0

  .breadcrumb ol

  .breadcrumb li
    font-size: 11px

    margin: 0


  .breadcrumb li > a
    color: #fff

    &:hover,
    &:focus
      color: #fff


  .breadcrumb > li + li:before
    @extend .glyphicon

    @extend .glyphicon-menu-right:before

    font-size: 8px

    padding: 0 3px 0 1px

    color: #fff


  .breadcrumb > .active
    color: #fff
